text: Chernigovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Polyakovsky Selsoviet, Davlekanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 107 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 25 km from Davlekanovo, 5 km from Polyakovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Davlekanovsky District
title: Chernigovka, Davlekanovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
